summary: Amaro Carabel, about to get married, asks for a salary increase that gets him fired. He then decides to stop being an honest man so as to not end up single.
cast: Fernando Fernán Gómez|María Luz Galicia|Rafael López Somoza|Julia Caba Alba|Joaquín Roa|Rosario García Ortega|Julio Sanjuán|Fernando Rodríguez Molina|Xan das Bolas|Julio Goróstegui|Aníbal Vela|José María Gavilán|Manuel Alexandre|Ángel Álvarez|Antonio García Quijada|Ángela Tamayo|Lis Rogi|Isana Medel|Carmen Sánchez|Miguel Armario|María Rey|Julia Delgado Caro|José G. Rey|Miguel Pastor|Antonio Molino Rojo|Antonio Moreno
title: El malvado Carabel
